<manifest android:installLocation="auto"> <uses-permission android:name="android.permission.INTERNET"/> <application android:enabled="true" android:persistent="true">
<activity> <intent-filter> <action android:name="android.intent.action.MAIN" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.LAUNCHER" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
<!-- This intent is being received here when activity android:name=".AppEntry" --> <!-- But all it does is call INVOKE in ANESampleTest.as --> <!-- When android:name=".SendIntentActivity" to try to pass it to the ANE --> <!-- The intent is available from MainActivity, but it crashes the app -->
<activity android:name="com.adobe.sampleasextension.SendIntentActivity" android:label="AppEntry" android:exported="true"> <intent-filter> <action android:name="com.speakaboos.android.intent.SHARE" /> <category android:name="android.intent.category.DEFAULT" /> <data android:mimeType="text/plain" /> </intent-filter> </activity>
</application> </manifest>
